entry.title: Accounting
entry.content:
Checklist during your onboarding

We welcome you to the Anexus team! As part of the onboarding process, we would like to cover the following topics:

  • Welcome
  • Contract in place (review contract length)
  • Review invoicing
  • Verify all access (Email, Unify People, Flowdock, Wiki, etc.)
  • Time Tracking
  • Wiki
  • FlowDock

Important

We feel also important to share with what we have identified to makes things easier when working with remote teams. Almost like a recipe for success kind of thing:

  • Your daily availability
  • Expectations that partners have right when you come onboard
  • Communication with your team
  • Why saying NO is good

entry.title: Introduction
entry.content:
The Wiki is intended to be the first go-to resource during the process of onboarding as well as during the term of your contract with Anexus.

As a reminder, the Wiki is a live document under continuous development; we appreciate your feedback on the depth of the documentation so we can continue extending it. Also, feel free to create your own branch and make changes.

About

Anexus is a Web Development Shop and Nearshore Staffing company located in Latin America. As a leader in the Drupal Community, Anexus works with local communities to spread the word on Drupal and its related technologies.

Our Services

  • Web Development
  • Allocation Services
  • Training
  • Audit / Consulting Services

Our Areas of Expertise

  • Drupal Backend and Frontend Development
  • JavaScript Libraries (jQuery, React, Marionette & Ionic)
